resources.string: "There is no friend as loyal as a book.”\n-Ernest Hemingway
BookMart is a second hand book store where you can find used books at a resonable price. Just sign up for the BookMart account and there you go!
‘के हो ठुलो जगतमा?’ ‘पसिना विवेक’ ‘उद्देश्य के लिनु?’ ‘उडि छुनु चन्द्र एक।’\n-लक्ष्मी प्रसाद देवकोटा
Q: What is BookMart?\n A: BookMart is the online second hand book store.
Q: What kinds of books are available here?\n A: This app is developed mostly focusing the used course books. Despite this, non fiction genre books are also available.
Q: Are there any hidden charges to use this app?\n A: No. This app is totally free for all. All you need to do is to sign up.
